name: Akians Power Of Time
description:
Akians Power of time: 

The newest "Catch them all" style game with the theme:

REWIND!

Choose 1 of the 3 akians to start your adventure with!

Flammec: The volcanic type

Purraqua: The Ocean type

Grasshound: The Forest type

Controls:

WASD to move

Shift to run

Battle info:

All moves in use stamina (the number under the move's name is the stamina usage, stamina is the orange bar)

To refill stamina you wait a turn (wait button)

The special rewind move's can only be used once in battle! so use them wisely

if you find any bugs let me know in the comments

 (as i tried to fix as many as i could before the gamejam submission time was over)
